Clean Up Server Session Resources

server_clean.Rd

Handles cleanup tasks when a Shiny session ends by logging session termination and closing database connections. Should be called within server initialization.

Usage

server_clean(session, logger, zone = "SURVEY")

Arguments

session

Shiny session object

logger

Logger object with log_message method for event recording

zone

Character. Logging zone identifier. Default: "SURVEY"

Value

No return value, called for side effects

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  logger <- LoggerFactory$new()
  server_clean(session, logger)
}
} # }
